org.apache.fop.render.awt.viewer

Class PageChangeEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.EventObject
      • org.apache.fop.render.awt.viewer.PageChangeEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class PageChangeEvent
extends java.util.EventObject
    Swing event fired whenever the current page selection of a PreviewPanel changes. Page numbers are 0-based.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • PageChangeEvent

        public PageChangeEvent(PreviewPanel panel,
               int oldPage,
               int newPage)
        Creates an new page change event.
        Parameters:
        panel - the preview panel the event is produced for.
        oldPage - the old page (zero based)
        newPage - the new page (zero based)
